newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-MacMahon wins A$25 million contract.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-MacMahon wins A$25 million contract.

text.p: Mining contractor and civil engineering group MacMahon Holdings Ltd had won the A$25 million contract to build stage one of the A$120 million Southern Expressway, the South Australian government said on Wednesday.
State Transport Minister Diana Laidlaw said in a statement the contract had been awarded to MacMahon's fully owned subsidiary MacMahon Contractors Pty Ltd.
The contract is for construction of roadworks, bridges, and other major works on the 7.5 kilometres first stage of the 22 kilometre Adelaide suburban roadway, she said.
